body.name: EPSON 502 EcoTank Ink Ultra-high Capacity Bottle Color Combo Pack Works with ET-2750, ET-2760, ET-2850, ET-3750, ET-3760, ET-3850, ET-4850, and other select EcoTank models
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Save up to 80 percent with low-cost replacement ink bottles vs. ink cartridges (2)
EcoFit ink bottles ― uniquely keyed for easy filling
Genuine Epson Ink ― reliable performance, brilliant results
Epson strongly recommends the use of genuine ink to ensure optimal print quality and performance. Use of non-genuine ink could cause damage not covered under the printer’s ltd. wnty.
body.description: Epson’s EcoTank replacement ink bottles offer thousands of vivid pages (1), while delivering genuine Epson quality. When it comes time to buy more ink, you save up to 80 percent on low-cost replacement ink bottles (2). Plus, these ink bottles feature exclusive autostop technology, with each color uniquely keyed for easy filling of each tank. Ideal for everyday printing, these ultra high-capacity inks mean you can go longer before replacing them for an unbeatable combination of value (3) and convenience. 1. Replacement ink bottle yields based on the ISO/IEC 24712 pattern with Epson’s methodology. Actual ink yields will vary considerably for reasons including images printed, print settings, temperature and humidity. Yields may be lower when printing infrequently or predominantly with one ink color. All ink colors are used for printing and printer maintenance, and all colors must be available for printing. For more information, visit our official site. 2. Savings comparison based on the purchase cost of replacement ink bottles and the cost of enough cartridges to achieve the total page yields of the bottles using the manufacturers’ online prices and yields for the highest-capacity cartridges for the best-selling, similarly featured consumer inkjet printers priced at $499 or less per NPD, July 2016. Actual savings will vary based on print tasks, print volumes and usage conditions. 3. Based on average monthly document print volumes of about 150 pages (ET-2700, ET-2750), 300 pages (ET-3700, ET-3750, ET-4750).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Printing Savior! Ultra-High Capacity, Incredible Quality, and Eco-Friendly Too!
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying that the ultra-high capacity of this ink bottle is an absolute game-changer. With a whopping 127 mL capacity, I can print thousands of pages before needing to refill the tank. This means fewer trips to the store, less time wasted on cartridge replacements, and more money saved in the long run.The quality of the ink is equally impressive. The black text comes out razor-sharp with outstanding contrast, making it perfect for printing professional documents and reports. The ink also dries quickly and is resistant to smudging and fading, ensuring that my prints maintain their high-quality appearance over time.One of my favorite features of this ink bottle is its drip-free nozzle design. It makes refilling the ink tank a breeze, with no messy spills or wasted ink. The bottle itself is also compact and lightweight, making it easy to store and transport.As an environmentally conscious shopper, I'm pleased to note that the EPSON T502 EcoTank Ink is manufactured using eco-friendly processes and contains less plastic than traditional ink cartridges. This makes it a more sustainable choice, and I appreciate that I'm doing my part to reduce waste.Overall, I can't recommend the EPSON T502 EcoTank Ink Ultra-high Capacity Bottle Black (T502120-S) enough. With its impressive capacity, exceptional quality, ease of use, and sustainability, it's a no-brainer for anyone looking to streamline their printing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best printer on market
reviews.reviewText: Has large black ink compartment. Have had for over two years and just bought new ink supplies for about $60. The ink dispensers have none drip adapeters which allows mess free refills. Enough ink in bottles to add another load of ink when needed. Can't say it is twice the ink. No need for knock off inks. This has been a great printer purchase. Prints, copies and scans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eco tank is the way to go.
reviews.reviewText: This ink is a great value for the price. I operate a non-profit and print a lot of promotional materials. This ink does the job nicely and at a frugal price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and quality.
reviews.reviewText: Great price (on prime day) and OEM Quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used my Epson printer for over a year before I had to refill the black ink reservoir. The print quality did not vary. I use my printer frequently and have had no problems with the unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This ink will print a huge amount of documents. Is a great value.
reviews.reviewText: Is easy to install in the printer. Is a great value. Goes a long, long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Several good features, though a bit faint on color printing
reviews.reviewText: So far, I like this printer / scanner / copier, though I've not yet tried the scanning feature. Black print is fine; color is pretty true to life but somewhat fainter than optimal; my wife's HP gives a more crisp color output. Printing time is a bit slow but acceptable; I like the available two-sided printing when I'm doing multiple pages. Footprint is nice; the machine doesn't take up a lot of room. Control display is very small and not always easy to read--this feature seems like it would be easy enough for Epson to improve. Setting up the connections (I used WiFi) took longer than I would think it needed, but I did get through it. Overall a good printer, and I like the "tank" ink system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn,t Make Sense To Use A Knockoff
reviews.reviewText: I have had my printer now for a little over three years and have just now, for the first time, filled all the ink tanks and I do a fair amount of printing. My total page count is over 3500. The ink arrived intact with absolutely no leakage. Each of the tanks filled perfectly and I still had about 1/4 of a bottle left over for each color. I know there are a lot of aftermarket brands of ink out there but quite honestly, it just doesn't make sense to buy a knockoff in order to save a couple of dollars a year. With my previous HP printer, I had been replacing at least one of the color cartridges every couple of months. As consumers, we have been complaining for years about the high cost of replacement cartridges and asking the manufacturers to produce just one printer where we could refill it with bulk ink. Epson has done that and has priced the ink quite reasonably. In the last three years I have only had to run a printhead cleaning cycle a couple of times when I noticed that there was a slight degradation in the print quality and it was corrected immediately. The print and picture quality is quite good. I just don't see any reason not to buy original Epson ink. I support the manufacturer that supported the consumers.

This ink is not only affordable but also lasts quite a long time. I use the 502 ink for printing my photos & it uses a lot of ink. I’m impressed especially printing my photos how far the ink goes. It’s cheaper for me to buy photo paper & print off my own photos. It also prints better than the kiosk we have in town. Since I’m a scrapbooker & had lived on a farm it was more convenient for me. All in all I give the 502 ink a thumbs up.
This ink refill is easy to use

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great. No head cleaning needed
reviews.reviewText: Filled very easily. Printed well in black.
This is the recommended ink made by Epson. No problems at all, works as expected.
